text:
Company: Inquire for Name 
Position: Mentor -- Full-Time
Location: Remote
Email: inquire for email
We are a fantasy sports platform, working to change the way users view and play fantasy sports. 
We are looking for equity partners on the programming side that are willing to work with us on our product roadmap and help us achieve scale.
Requirements:
- 5 years of experience as a developer or designer
- US Citizen
Compensation:
- Equity Compensation
